design_philosophy.vibe: Performance Pro x Cyber-Industrial. Precision, Automation, High-Contrast.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase tracking-widest for labels. Bold/Black for main titles.
usage_rules.numbers: Use JetBrains Mono for all invoice numbers, currency, and IDs.

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). Use CSS Grid.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous padding inside containers (p-6, p-8) but tight gaps (gap-4) to create dense information islands.
layout_strategies.containers: Sharp corners (rounded-sm) or minimal radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes for containers.
layout_strategies.z_index: Layer 1: Background, Layer 2: Grid Borders, Layer 3: Content, Layer 4: Sticky Headers, Layer 5: Modals/Overlays.

buttons.secondary: bg-surface border border-border hover:border-primary/50 hover:text-primary transition-colors

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #27272A. Use 'border-r' and 'border-b' on grid items to create the 'Technical' grid look.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Glows over Drop Shadows. Use box-shadow to create colored light bleed.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background if possible (opacity 0.03).

login_hero.description: Abstract geometric cubes with green light lines - represents automation and structure.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-precision tool for businesses. It must feel solid, fast, and responsive. No 'playful' bounce animations. Use 'ease-out-expo' for snapping motions.
instructions_to_main_agent.fonts: Import fonts in your main CSS or entry file. Apply 'font-sans' (IBM Plex Sans) to headings and 'font-body' (Manrope) to text. Use 'font-mono' (JetBrains Mono) for data.
instructions_to_main_agent.tailwind_config: Extend the tailwind config to add these specific colors and font families. Do not just use 'slate-900'. Use the specific hex codes provided in 'colors'.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard_structure: Create a layout wrapper component that handles the Sidebar (collapsed icon mode on mobile, full on desktop) and Topbar.
instructions_to_main_agent.workflow_visualization: For the 'Email Scan Results', design it like a Terminal or Log Output. Dark background, monospace text, color-coded keywords (Invoice: Green, Missing: Red).
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: Do not use zebra striping. Use single line borders (border-b) with a hover effect that highlights the entire row in 'surface_highlight'.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) only for the Sidebar and Topbar.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons. Use Lucide React icons.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
